Name: Turkey
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring or fall. Takes 8 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera u otoño. Tardan 8 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 또는 가을 작물. 성장하려면 8일이 소요됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter au printemps ou en automne. Prend 8 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal, vagy nyáron ültesse el. 8 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春と秋植えの種。8日で収穫できる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante isso na primavera ou no outono. Leva 8 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте их весной или осенью. Созревание занимает 8 дней
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Baharda veya güzde ekilir. 8 günde yetişir.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天或秋天播种。8天成熟。
